architectural_notes: Add a way to suppress/disable automated success/toast messages globally without changing other app behavior.

existing_features.title: Suppress/hide all automated in-app system toast notifications (e.g., Sonner toasts such as "Mission created successfully") so they do not render anywhere in the UI.

new_feature_requests.summary: Hide/suppress automated in-app system messages (e.g., "mission created successfully") so they do not appear in the UI; change nothing else.

projectName: Hide automated in-app system toast messages
